name: Natlan: The Land of Fire and Competition (II)

achievements.name: Continental Explorer: Pyre Plains (II)
achievements.desc: Light up the maps of the following areas in Natlan: Tezcatepetonco Range, Quahuacan Cliff, and Ochkanatlan.

achievements.name: Scaling the Scorching Sacred Mountain (II)
achievements.desc: Unlock all Teleport Waypoints in the following areas in Natlan: Tezcatepetonco Range, Quahuacan Cliff, and Ochkanatlan.

achievements.name: Sanctuary Pilgrim: Pyre Plains (II)
achievements.desc: Unlock all the Shrines of Depths in the following areas in Natlan: Quahuacan Cliff and Ochkanatlan.

achievements.name: Offerings to the Night: Pyre Plains (II)
achievements.desc: Unlock all the seals on the secret spaces of the tribes in the following areas in Natlan: Tezcatepetonco Range and Quahuacan Cliff.

achievements.name: Monetoo Will Guide You Home (II)
achievements.desc: Follow 3 Monetoo and complete the graffiti in Tezcatepetonco Range, Quahuacan Cliff, and Ochkanatlan.

achievements.name: Monetoo Will Guide You Home (II)
achievements.desc: Follow 6 Monetoo and complete the graffiti in Tezcatepetonco Range, Quahuacan Cliff, and Ochkanatlan.

achievements.name: Monetoo Will Guide You Home (II)
achievements.desc: Follow 10 Monetoo and complete the graffiti in Tezcatepetonco Range, Quahuacan Cliff, and Ochkanatlan.

achievements.name: Ignited Treasure Hunter (II)
achievements.desc: Open 40 chests in Tezcatepetonco Range, Quahuacan Cliff, and Ochkanatlan.

achievements.name: Ignited Treasure Hunter (II)
achievements.desc: Open 80 chests in Tezcatepetonco Range, Quahuacan Cliff, and Ochkanatlan.

achievements.name: Ignited Treasure Hunter (II)
achievements.desc: Open 160 chests in Tezcatepetonco Range, Quahuacan Cliff, and Ochkanatlan.

achievements.name: Ignited Adventurer (II)
achievements.desc: Complete 3 Open World Time Trial Challenges in Tezcatepetonco Range, Quahuacan Cliff, and Ochkanatlan.

achievements.name: Ignited Adventurer (II)
achievements.desc: Complete 6 Open World Time Trial Challenges in Tezcatepetonco Range, Quahuacan Cliff, and Ochkanatlan.

achievements.name: Ignited Adventurer (II)
achievements.desc: Complete 10 Open World Time Trial Challenges in Tezcatepetonco Range, Quahuacan Cliff, and Ochkanatlan.

achievements.name: Lost Traveler in the Ashen Realm
achievements.desc: Complete "Lost Traveler in the Ashen Realm."

achievements.name: The Finishing Touch?
achievements.desc: Restore the power of the giant work of graffiti on Tezcatepetonco Range.
